snippet.title: SAND LAND project – Visual Adaptation Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
SAND LAND, a work by Akira Toriyama, is being made into a visual adaptation produced by SUNRISE, Kamikaze Douga, and ANIMA!

The SAND LAND project will introduce you to the world, characters, and vehicles from SAND LAND through various collaborations and mediums.

Follow the Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/sandland_pj
 
■ About SAND LAND
#SANDLAND is a popular manga created by #AkiraToriyama, the author of DRAGON BALL and Dr. Slump. Serialized intensively for a short period in Weekly Shonen Jump in 2000, the one volume comic has gained worldwide popularity since its publishing.
 
■ Story
In a desert world where both demons and humans suffer from an extreme water shortage, Beelzebub, the prince of demons, and Rao, a small-town sheriff, form a tag-team and set off on an adventure in search of the Phantom Lake somewhere in the desert.
 
©BIRD STUDIO/SHUEISHA  ©SAND LAND Film Partners  

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
